"Material is the metaphor.

"
"A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion." "The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet " "technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.
" "Surfaces and edges of the material provide visual cues that are grounded in reality. The " "use of familiar tactile attributes helps users quickly understand affordances. Yet the " "flexibility of the material creates new affordances that supercede those in the physical " "world, without breaking the rules of physics.
" "The fundamentals of light, surface, and movement are key to conveying how objects move, " "interact, and exist in space and in relation to each other. Realistic lighting shows " "seams, divides space, and indicates moving parts.

"
"Bold, graphic, intentional.

"
"The foundational elements of print based design typography, grids, space, scale, color, " "and use of imagery guide visual treatments. These elements do far more than please the " "eye. They create hierarchy, meaning, and focus. Deliberate color choices, edge to edge " "imagery, large scale typography, and intentional white space create a bold and graphic " "interface that immerse the user in the experience.
" "An emphasis on user actions makes core functionality immediately apparent and provides " "waypoints for the user.

"
"Motion provides meaning.

"
"Motion respects and reinforces the user as the prime mover. Primary user actions are " "inflection points that initiate motion, transforming the whole design.
" "All action takes place in a single environment. Objects are presented to the user without " "breaking the continuity of experience even as they transform and reorganize.
" "Motion is meaningful and appropriate, serving to focus attention and maintain continuity. " "Feedback is subtle yet clear. Transitions are efﬁcient yet coherent.

"
"3D world.

"
"The material environment is a 3D space, which means all objects have x, y, and z " "dimensions. The z-axis is perpendicularly aligned to the plane of the display, with the " "positive z-axis extending towards the viewer. Every sheet of material occupies a single " "position along the z-axis and has a standard 1dp thickness.
" "On the web, the z-axis is used for layering and not for perspective. The 3D world is " "emulated by manipulating the y-axis.

"
"Light and shadow.

"
"Within the material environment, virtual lights illuminate the scene. Key lights create " "directional shadows, while ambient light creates soft shadows from all angles.
" "Shadows in the material environment are cast by these two light sources. In Android " "development, shadows occur when light sources are blocked by sheets of material at " "various positions along the z-axis. On the web, shadows are depicted by manipulating the " "y-axis only. The following example shows the card with a height of 6dp.

"
"Resting elevation.

"
"All material objects, regardless of size, have a resting elevation, or default elevation " "that does not change. If an object changes elevation, it should return to its resting " "elevation as soon as possible.

"
"Component elevations.

"
"The resting elevation for a component type is consistent across apps (e.g., FAB elevation " "does not vary from 6dp in one app to 16dp in another app).
" "Components may have different resting elevations across platforms, depending on the depth " "of the environment (e.g., TV has a greater depth than mobile or desktop).

"
"Responsive elevation and dynamic elevation offsets.

"
"Some component types have responsive elevation, meaning they change elevation in response " "to user input (e.g., normal, focused, and pressed) or system events. These elevation " "changes are consistently implemented using dynamic elevation offsets.
" "Dynamic elevation offsets are the goal elevation that a component moves towards, relative " "to the component’s resting state. They ensure that elevation changes are consistent " "across actions and component types. For example, all components that lift on press have " "the same elevation change relative to their resting elevation.
" "Once the input event is completed or cancelled, the component will return to its resting " "elevation.

"
"Avoiding elevation interference.

"
"Components with responsive elevations may encounter other components as they move between " "their resting elevations and dynamic elevation offsets. Because material cannot pass " "through other material, components avoid interfering with one another any number of ways, " "whether on a per component basis or using the entire app layout.
" "On a component level, components can move or be removed before they cause interference. " "For example, a floating action button (FAB) can disappear or move off screen before a " "user picks up a card, or it can move if a snackbar appears.
" "On the layout level, design your app layout to minimize opportunities for interference. " "For example, position the FAB to one side of stream of a cards so the FAB won’t interfere " "when a user tries to pick up one of cards.

"
Multiple travel up to 120 days maximum per trip

Modelo exclusivo de IATAI de servicio médico online con atención diferencial, conecta a médicos con viajeros internacionales que buscan asistencia médica inmediata, las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana a nivel mundial. Sin necesidad de trámites administrativos previos.
Viaja tranquilo todo el año con gastos médicos ilimitados, podrás recuperar la inversión si cancelas y hacer compras online al mejor precio.
Disfruta tus viajes sin preocupaciones todo el año. Tendrás 500.000 USD en gastos médicos y una indemnización si pierdes tu equipaje.

string-array.name: h1_items
string-array.item: Feel protected against any eventuality medical emergency resulting from an illness or accident.

string-array.name: h2_items
string-array.item: You will be protected against such difficult situations,that even involve a large expense for your family as repatriation.

string-array.name: h3_items
string-array.item: If during your trip you will practice,practice or participate , as an amateur ; in high-risk sports competitions , you will be protected against any medical eventuality. * Subject to conditions of use and service.

string-array.name: h4_items
string-array.item: You will be protected against any eventuality medical emergency arising from a health condition suffered prior to the travel date. * Subject to conditions of use and service.

string-array.name: h5_items
string-array.item: During your pregnancy you will have medical protection ( including emergency medical checkups and ultrasounds ) by unforeseen complications , until the 28th week of gestation. * Subject to conditions of use and service.

string-array.name: h6_items
string-array.item: Emergency Dental treatment necessary to resolve the unexpected sharp pain , except for infection.

string-array.name: h7_items
string-array.item: Medicines required for the treatment of injury or illness are covered , everything must be under prescription.

string-array.name: h8_items
string-array.item: In the event that the Holder must remain hospitalized for more than three ( 5) days , we will pay the cost of plane ticket on a commercial airline, regularly scheduled flight, economy class.

string-array.name: h9_items
string-array.item: In the event that you must interrupt your trip death a relative ( spouse, parent, or child ) , we will pay the penalty of initial ticket or return ticket if you can not change the initial ticket.

string-array.name: h10_items
string-array.item: In the event that you should prolong the journey beyond schedule as a result of an illness or accident during the trip and that need has been indicated by the attending physician , we will pay the costs and expenses of hotel accommodation and food to the limit indicated and for a maximum period of ten ( 10) days.

string-array.name: h11_items
string-array.item: In the event that you should stay in the hospital for more than five ( 5) days , we will pay the accommodation and feeding of your companion to the limit indicated.

string-array.name: h1A_items
string-array.item: If you should cancel or interrupt your trip for just cause we will refund up to 100 % of non-refundable expenses and / or recoverable . If canceled for any reason other , we will refund up to 75 % of non-refundable expenses and / or recoverable . The plan must have acquired at least 21 days prior to the departure and communicated the cancellation 72 hours before the trip started

string-array.name: h2A_items
string-array.item: If for some reason you must cancel your trip , we will refund non-refundable expenses and / or recoverable your flight ticket . The issue should have been done and paid for at least 21 days prior to the departure and communicated the cancellation 72 hours before the trip started.

string-array.name: h3A_items
string-array.item: If the tour operator ( cruise or airline ) with which you hired your trip out of the business with or without bankruptcy , we will refund the costs Up to 100% of the non- recoverable

string-array.name: h4A_items
string-array.item: If you must interrupt your trip for work and are Cardmember Corporate / Business Credit , we will refund non-refundable expenses and / or recoverable.

string-array.name: h5A_items
string-array.item: The compensation will be immediate, daily , from the time the PIR (Property Irregularity Report) is submitted to the coverage indicated on the product.

string-array.name: h1C_items
string-array.item: If you buy a product through Onepocket and find an equivalent offer on make, model and serial for a lower rate , you will be covered with a refund for the price difference.

string-array.name: h2C_items
string-array.item: Enjoy your shopping and make sure feel with the toppings we offer you refuge in case of qualified theft and accidental damage to the goods you buy with your credit or debit card through Onepocket.

string-array.name: h3C_items
string-array.item: We extend the factory warranty for your new appliances purchased through Onepocket, once this has expired. You can assert your insurance and get the repair or replacement of your product,without losing your money.

string-array.name: h4C_items
string-array.item: If you can not attend a scheduled show, we will refund the value of your ballot.

string-array.name: h5C_items
string-array.item: You are protected in case of accident 24 hours , 365 days a year. This insurance is an economic support to you and / or your family to traumatic contingencies.

string-array.name: h6C_items
string-array.item: Protection Liability and Warranty

string-array.name: h1F_items
string-array.item: You will be protected when you are forced by violence or threat to take away or withdraw money from an ATM . Thinking of all , also took shelter medical expenses you must incur for bodily or physical injury in case of aggression motive of theft of money

string-array.name: h2F_items
string-array.item: Protect your bag and inside you! No need to worry about replacement costs for theft of your wallet , as well as the costs of transshipment, exclusively for the theft or loss of the following personal documents: identity card , aliens identity card , passport, pass driving , police certificate , military and credit and / or debit cards that have some cost to the bank card book .

string-array.name: h3F_items
string-array.item: We protect your data from cyber attacks or cyber incident with our coverage for responsibility for data protection.
